books.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.description: A fascinating exploration into the mind of a beautiful, charming, charasmatic, degenerate, narcissistic, sociopath.

books.title: The Almanack of Naval Ravikant
books.author: Eric Jorgenson
books.description: All of the pithy advice about money, technology, and life from the legendary silicon valley angel investor himself.

books.title: goodbye,things
books.author: Fumio Sasaki
books.description: An easy read and a great introduction into the philosophies of minimalism and simple living.

books.title: The Ancient Art of Stoic Joy
books.author: William B. Irvine
books.description: Does your philosophy of life guide you in achieving tranquility—a state marked by the absence of negative emotion. Wait, you do have a philosophy of life, right?

books.title: Digital Minimalism
books.author: Cal Newport
books.description: A guide into the forces that shape the internet, mainly the Digital Attention Economy. Also contains helpful tips about dealing with information overload and economizing tech usage.

books.title: How Not To Die
books.author: Dr. Michael Greger
books.description: An evidence-based argument about the role that diet and lifestyle play in the development, reversal, or prevention of all-cause mortality and chronic disease.

books.title: Move Your DNA
books.author: Katy Bowman
books.description: Explains the science behind the body's need for natural movement and the reason why our comfortable lifestyles of cars, shoes, beds, and chairs are making our bodies weak and prone to injury
